questions.title: Invite Friend for a Sleepover
questions.question: Write a letter to invite your best friend for a sleepover.
paragraphs: 16/8, Dhvani, 21st Cross Street, Indira Nagar, Adyar, Chennai – 600020. 10th February, 2026.
Dear Vidyut,

How are you? I hope you are doing well. I am writing to invite you for a sleepover at my house this weekend. It has been a long time since we spent time together, and I thought this would be a great way to have fun!

My parents have agreed to the sleepover on Saturday night. We can play video games, watch movies, and have pizza for dinner. I have also got some new board games that I want to try with you. We can stay up late and talk about school, our hobbies, and everything else. In the morning, my mother will make us a delicious breakfast.
I really hope you can come. Please ask your parents and let me know soon. It will not be the same without you! If you need, my father can pick you up from your house in the evening.
Do reply soon. I am eagerly waiting to hear from you. Give my regards to Uncle and Aunty. Yours lovingly, Anirudh

questions.title: RSVP to an Invite
questions.question: Write a letter to your cousin as an RSVP to an invite for your grandfather's 80th birthday function.
paragraphs: 16/8, Dhvani, 21st Cross Street, Indira Nagar, Adyar, Chennai – 600020. 10th February, 2026.
Dear Adeep,
How are you? I hope you and your family are doing well. Thank you so much for the invitation to Thatha's 80th birthday celebration. We were all very happy to receive it!

I am delighted to confirm that our entire family will be attending the function. My parents, my brother, and I are all very excited. Thatha turning 80 is such a special milestone, and we would not miss it for anything. We have already started thinking about what gift to get for him. It will be wonderful to see all the relatives together and celebrate this happy occasion.

Please let us know if there is anything we can help with for the preparations. We are happy to assist in any way. Also, kindly share the exact venue address and timing so that we can plan our travel accordingly.
Please convey our regards to Thatha, Paatti, and everyone at home. We are counting the days until the celebration. See you soon! Yours affectionately, Anirudh

questions.title: Congratulating Cousin for Winning Competition
questions.question: Write a letter to your cousin congratulating him for winning a table tennis competition.
paragraphs: 16/8, Dhvani, 21st Cross Street, Indira Nagar, Adyar, Chennai – 600020. 10th February, 2026.
Dear Adeep,
How are you? I hope you are doing well. Congratulations on winning the table tennis competition! I was so happy and proud when I heard the news. You truly deserve this success!

I know how hard you have been practising for this tournament. I remember you telling me about your early morning practice sessions and the extra coaching classes you were attending. All your hard work and dedication have finally paid off. Winning at the district level is a great achievement, and I am sure this is just the beginning of many more victories.
You have always been passionate about table tennis, and it is inspiring to see you succeed. I hope to watch you play someday. Maybe you can teach me a few tricks when we meet next time!
Please convey my congratulations to Uncle and Aunty as well. They must be very proud of you. Keep up the great work! Wishing you all the best for future competitions. Your proud cousin, Anirudh

questions.title: Advising Younger Brother About Pocket Money
questions.question: Write a letter to your younger brother advising him to be more careful in spending his pocket money.
paragraphs: 16/8, Dhvani, 21st Cross Street, Indira Nagar, Adyar, Chennai – 600020. 10th February, 2026.
Dear Prahlad,

How are you? I hope you are doing well in school. I am writing to talk to you about something important — your pocket money. Amma told me that you have been spending it all within the first few days and then asking for more. I think you should be more careful.

Pocket money is given to us so that we can learn to manage money wisely. Instead of spending it all at once on snacks and toys, try to save a little each week. You can keep a small notebook and write down what you spend. This will help you see where your money goes. If you save regularly, you will soon have enough to buy something bigger that you really want, like that cricket bat you were talking about.
I am not saying you should not enjoy your pocket money. Just think before you spend. Ask yourself — do I really need this? Can I wait? These small habits will help you a lot when you grow up.
I hope you understand that I am saying this because I care about you. Give my love to Amma and Appa. Write back and tell me how you are doing. Your loving brother, Anirudh

questions.title: Thanking Grand Aunt for Birthday Gift
questions.question: Write a letter of thanks to your grand aunt who sent you a beautiful puppy on your birthday.
paragraphs: 16/8, Dhvani, 21st Cross Street, Indira Nagar, Adyar, Chennai – 600020. 10th February, 2026.
Dear Patta Paatti,

How are you? I hope you are in good health. I am writing to thank you from the bottom of my heart for the most wonderful birthday gift — the adorable puppy! I was so surprised and happy when I saw him. It is the best gift I have ever received!

The puppy is so cute and playful. He has soft golden fur and big brown eyes. I have named him "Bruno." He loves to run around the house and play with his ball. He follows me everywhere and sleeps next to my bed at night. Taking care of him is teaching me responsibility. I feed him, take him for walks, and make sure he is comfortable. My whole family has fallen in love with him!
You always know exactly what will make me happy. I have wanted a pet for so long, and you made my dream come true. I will take very good care of Bruno and send you photos and videos of him.
Thank you once again for this precious gift. Please take care of your health. I hope to see you soon and introduce Bruno to you in person! With lots of love, Anirudh

questions.title: Asking Permission to Stay During Tennis Meet
questions.question: Write an informal letter to your aunt, asking for permission to stay with her when you visit Delhi to attend a tennis meet there.
paragraphs: 16/8, Dhvani, 21st Cross Street, Indira Nagar, Adyar, Chennai – 600020. 10th February, 2026.
Dear Srividya Aunty,

How are you? I hope you and Uncle are doing well. I am writing to ask you for a favour. I have been selected to participate in a tennis tournament in Delhi next month, and I would like to request your permission to stay at your house during the meet.

The tournament is from 15th to 18th March at the Delhi Tennis Academy. My coach and some teammates will also be travelling, but I would feel much more comfortable staying with family. Your house is also quite close to the venue, which would make it convenient for me to travel for my matches. I promise I will not disturb your daily routine and will take care of my own needs as much as possible.

This is an important tournament for me, and having your support would mean a lot. I will also get to spend some time with you, which I always enjoy. Please let me know if it is okay with you. My parents will call you to discuss the details.
Please convey my regards to Uncle and my cousins. I eagerly await your reply. Thank you in advance for considering my request. Your loving nephew, Anirudh
